amendment.description: To provide improved intercity bus, hazardous materials, pipeline, and motor carrier security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4988 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4988 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S9567-9574) To provide improved intercity bus, hazardous materials, pipeline, and motor carrier security.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4988 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4988 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lautenberg.
